thread.title: Tottenham 4 Stoke City 0: Dele Alli relieved to end his ‘difficult week’ on a high
thread.title_full: Tottenham 4 Stoke City 0: Dele Alli relieved to end his ‘difficult week’ on a high

author: jgordon
title: Tottenham 4 Stoke City 0: Dele Alli relieved to end his ‘difficult week’ on a high

organizations.name: related stories kane well able tottenham

text:
But he was the hero again yesterday with an impressive display and a goal against Stoke. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Tottenham Hotspur news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Dele, 20, said: “It has been a difficult week. 
“I felt horrible after the game and at half-time and I apologised to the boys as well. 
“I went to see the guy straight after the game. Reuters Dele Alli was shown the first red card of his professional career Related Stories Kane Well Able Tottenham 4 Stoke 0: Harry Kane hat-trick and Dele Alli smasher help Spurs soar past sorry visitors PARENTS' DESPAIR Estranged parents of Spurs and England star Dele Alli reveal their heartbreak at having no part in his life 'He said sorry' Dele Alli apologised to his Tottenham team-mates but did not mean his horror tackle, says Toby Alderweireld time to deliver Seven things to watch this Premier League weekend as Leicester's stars owe the fans, Dele Alli must shine and Chelsea could get sloppy 'Disgusting' Dele Alli blasted by BT pundits for his 'career-ending' tackle which saw Spurs star shown straight red card in disastrous 2-2 draw with Gent Alli oof Tottenham 2 Gent 2 (agg 2-3): Ten-man Spurs dumped out of Europa League after Dele Alli is shown straight red for horror tackle PA:Press Association This was the horror tackle from Dele Alli committed on Brecht Dejaegere that saw him see red 
“It was important I bounced back and helped the team. 
“When something like that happens you want to get out there and put it right.” Dele Alli’s headers put an end to Chelsea’s 13-match unbeaten run
